landmarks.name: Mount Sinai
landmarks.description: A significant religious site believed to be the location where Moses received the Ten Commandments.

landmarks.name: Saint Catherine's Monastery
landmarks.description: One of the oldest Christian monasteries in the world, nestled at the foot of Mount Sinai.

landmarks.name: Alexandria Library
landmarks.description: A stunning modern library that pays homage to the ancient Library of Alexandria.

landmarks.name: Qaitbay Citadel
landmarks.description: A 15th-century fortress overlooking the Mediterranean, built on the site of the ancient Lighthouse of Alexandria.

landmarks.name: Karnak Temple
landmarks.description: A massive temple complex in Luxor dedicated to the Theban gods and famous for its Hypostyle Hall.

landmarks.name: Valley of the Kings
landmarks.description: A royal burial site on Luxor's West Bank, home to the tombs of pharaohs like Tutankhamun.
